attributes.additional_details: Starting a petition to try and get pilton back to a safe and nice community to live in and bring our kids up!  If your fed up of all the trouble in the area then sign this!! Before we can go to the council to ask for a community meeting we need at least 20 signatures!! We also will need folk that are willing to help out organising and to attend any meetings with the community and officials? If you want to get this place sorted sign the petition!!!
